RadarAngleX.Wiki: X angle for recognizing hostile characters: The current line-of-sight direction is 0 degrees, and the top is +.

RadarAngleY.Wiki: Y angle for recognizing hostile characters: The current line-of-sight direction is 0 degrees, and the right is +.

TerritorySize.Wiki: The distance of your territory. If the recognizing player deviates from this distance, it will return to the initial position.

ForceThreatOnFirstLocked.Wiki: Whether to intimidate when recognizing the first player

Attack1_Margin.Wiki: Play between attacks. Do not vibrate near the distance

Attack1_DelayMin.Wiki: The minimum delay time from the time when an attack becomes possible to the time when an attack is possible.

Attack1_DelayMax.Wiki: The longest delay time from the time when an attack becomes possible to the time when an attack is possible.

Attack1_ConeAngle.Wiki: If the angle between the line-of-sight direction and the direction vector to the target is within this angle, the attack is OK.

Attack2_Margin.Wiki: Play between attacks. Do not vibrate near the distance

Attack2_DelayMin.Wiki: The minimum delay time from the time when an attack becomes possible to the time when an attack is possible.

Attack2_DelayMax.Wiki: The longest delay time from the time when an attack becomes possible to the time when an attack is possible.

Attack2_ConeAngle.Wiki: If the angle between the line-of-sight direction and the direction vector to the target is within this angle, the attack is OK.

Attack3_DelayMin.Wiki: The minimum delay time from the time when an attack becomes possible to the time when an attack is possible.

Attack3_ConeAngle.Wiki: If the angle between the line-of-sight direction and the direction vector to the target is within this angle, the attack is OK.
